headline: Nationwide Shutdown, Rising Protests and a Leadership Reshuffle Deepen Iran's Crisis as Oil Falls 20%
summary: Iran is experiencing a countrywide shutdown triggered by intensifying protests and a deepening political and economic crisis. This government-ordered shutdown has impacted businesses, educational institutions, and government offices spanning 21 provinces. What Happened: The escalating protests have led to violent confrontations, resulting in the death of a member of Iran's paramilitary Revolutionary Guard. This incident, marking the first fatality among security forces during these protests, too
